title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 28, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 28, 2020
description:
On this episode of the Dan Patrick Show, we learned that the NBA is returning from the boycott, what is exactly is the end goal for the NBA players with this movement? NBA on TNT's Chris Haynes joins us from the bubble and North Dakota State Head Football Matt Entz joins the program. Plus, Fritzy shares an outrageous interaction he had at a bagel store this week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
